title: Courtesy of My Hall (4C44)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, stack a card from your discard pile here. Fellowship: Discard a Free Peoples card stacked here to heal a Dwarf.
Lore:	”'Now my guests, come!… Come and take such refreshment as haste allows.'”
Rarity:	C
